title: Aromas World
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Coffee shop offering bakery goods, breakfast food, and sandwiches with a few ovo-lacto vegetarian ones. Reported carries tofu for substitution. Many kinds of coffee and tea drinks, desserts including one vegan cake (call ahead to check availability). Has non-dairy milk for drinks.
